title: Is it possible to automatically generate stat reports?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I use Unity Ads for my game and would like to have automated stat reports made.

sections.title: Cause
content: You would like to know how to set up automated stat reports for Unity Ads.

sections.title: Resolution
content: You can get automated reports from the Publisher admin panel sent to your email.

• Go to Reports > Automated Reports.
  • Configure the report.
  • Select the reporting frequency and emails to send it to.
